column1: I bought this after trying two (more expensive) other skin creams which left my skin covered in acne. After using this for a few dsys the acne went away and it even smoothed out the dark spots left by the acne. At this price point, it is a great buy as i find it just as effective (if not more) as the kiehls product i was using before for $10-$15 more :) using it both as day and night cream on my dry skin. Great product
Not only does this moisturizer smell INCREDIBLE, but it is extremely emollient without feeling greasy or heavy. Perfect for day and night!

I have been using the Olay Regenerist Tone Perfecting Moisturizer for a little over 2 weeks now and I love it. It goes on so smoothly and absorbs into your skin and doesn't leave your skin feeling sticky. I can tell a difference in my dark spots, just barely, but I can tell they are lighter. I love the way it feels on my skin.
It's amazing makes my skin so soft
This product is delightful. Creamy. Smooth feeling. Not greasy. Helpful for my skin at my age (82).

I was never big into moisturizers because I didn't like my skin feeling or looking greasy… but I found that my skin was getting too dry without any. I love that this cream goes on silky smooth and doesn't leave a greasy oil slick on my face! Because of it's light smoothing consistency and the way it glides on my skin, I use it as a moisturizer and foundation primer during the day! (I was already used to the silicones in my primer, so now I can just use this one product instead of two). This adds up to big savings for me.

This cream is the answer for my dry parched skin. It feels so comforting and soft going on and it sinks right in giving my skin a silky feel. I even skip using my skin primer before applying my foundation because it gives my skin a beautiful surface to work on. I use this mainly as a night cream because I like a moisturizer with a SPF to wear during the day.

I only had a sample of this so obviously I cannot comment on the fading of dark spots. But it is easy to apply and blends well. It made my face feel really soft and smooth. It does contain Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, both of which are good for your skin. It also doesn't have much of a scent, which is good for me. With those ingredients and it being a moisturizer makes it a good product to try.

I have been using Olay products for years and I have not been disappointed. I just started using this particular product (1 year) - and I am very happy with the results. I am a senior citizen (71) and many people have told me that looking at my face they can't believe it.

This stuff cause me to break out and it leaves white patches on the face. The first 3 days it seems promising, but after that it break me out and not a good moisturizer, because it leaves white flakes on ur face unless you don't mind. And it didn't help me with the black spits on my face. I guess people are different, but if you have acne or one skin, u should run away from this because it will break u out

I've been using this product for a few years now. My skin looks 10 years younger than I am, and being a senior, that is greatly appreciated. People comment that I have a glow about me. About the flakiness, I periodically get that also, and have found that it just takes a tiny amount of the product to work it's magic. Love this product!!

I have tried my different skin care products over the last couple of years and none have made my skin look so healthy looking as the Luminous line. I have tan and red spots on my cheeks for a few years and in the last two months of using the Luminous Tone Perfecting Cream my spots have faded considerably. My skin is firm and glows. I highly recommend it. My only issues is I can only find it in one store in our area.

I have just tried this product for a week. I have very dry facial skin and I hope when keep using this product it will give me some results. You do not get right away results, so I will have to see if this product claims to do what it is supposed to do. Thanks.
So tried this out. so far so good. It is super smooth. not cakey. using it for about 2 weeks now. glowing? maybe. love it!

OLay Regenerist Luminous tone perfecting cream is wonderful. It evens out the skin tones, moisturizes, and gives a somewhat youthful glow to my aged skin. Wish it was easier to find in the stores. Love it.

I'm a huge Ulta beauty fan and been buying my face cream from Benefit and all those expensive name brands. This does exactly what they do for the half price. I will never go back to high end face creams

I was excited to try it to see if it would improve my dark spots. I used it in the morning then applied my makeup, about an hour later, I looked in the mirror and my makeup coverage had become blotchy. I washed my face and applied the lotion again, and I noticed that my makeup was blotchy because the lotion peels off of my skin. I only use it at night now.
DON'T KNOW YET IF SPOTS WILL BE REMOVED BUT IT FEELS GOON ON MY FACE
Nice packaging and delivered on time needed

This is a wonderful product. I have discoloration/melasma on my checks and this product has been wonderful. I noticed a slight difference within the first week. It has been four weeks now and the discoloration/melasma has evened out and lightened considerably. This product also lightens and brightens the area under your eyes. I highly recommend this product.
I love the soft feeling this moisturizer offers. I will be looking forward to lighter dark spots in 8 weeks!
olay regenerist luminous tone perfecting cream facial moisturizer. This does the same and has the same effects as the store brand products that are larger and cheaper.

I have used Oil of Olay since my early 20's for moisturizing (now 57) and have always been pleased with the product. I spent a lot of time in the sun and now my fair skin is paying for it. Olay Regenerist Luminous Tone Perfecting Cream works. It didn't eliminate my age/sun spots, but it did noticibly lighten them. It took about 2 months for results, so you have to be patient.

Used a sample that came in the Walmart Beauty Box and fell in love with it. I used to have bad acne problems as a teen, and after using so many different products on my skin for years, I now have red skin and it's hard to find a good toner that doesn't irritate. This lotion is awesome, it leaves my skin feeling soft and almost immediately disappears the redness. I must also mention that I have oily skin and that wasn't affected by the use of this product.

I have dark acne spots on chin and tried this hoping it would lighten & improve their appearance. It blends/absorbs on forehead but turns into a white flakey globby mess on nose, chin & cheeks! I tried again using less but same result. I noticed some reviewers had similar experience while majority had no problem at all. I'm curious as to why (skin type, age, application error?) . Very disappointed & still searching for a product that will help.

I purchased this product last evening. I used it before bed and again this morning. My boss noticed my skin glowing from across the office!! AMAZING! Never before have I had noticeable results in one day!!! Keep up the good work! I am 57 years old and look 37!
this is a really nice face cream. Softens skins and lightens the brown spots.
It does what it says, it minimizes a lot of the dark spots
The best product, my skin feels and looks silk smooth like never before.
You know what, I guess most of us except results in a few days, this clearly is bot possible, eat right, rest, and be happy, Im thinking the product would be great if I give it a fair chance.
This Olay Regenerist Luminous Tone Perfecting Cream Moisturizer is simply wonderful. I love how it makes my skin feel after application. So soft and hydrating that it seems to last all day.

I received a sample of this cream in my beauty box from Walmart and I had to go buy it! It makes my face feel amazing. I love how smooth my makeup goes on over top of it. I will be buying this again in the future.

I've noticed this with a few of Olay products. It feels nice and soft at first when you put it on but then starts to dry and clump up into flakes. This is such a cheap moisturizer. I really don't understand how it's selling for so much.

Olay Regenerist is an incredible tool against winter cold (and drying summer, for that matter). Still, it's particularly difficult to maintain soft, fresh skin in the winter--without Olay Regenerist! I've tried more expensive creams and serums, and keep returning to Olay Regenerist. I think you will, too.

Olay products have been around for years and keep getting better! The luminous did wonders in like three days. I recieved it in a Walmart beauty box so worth it. I will continue to use and very affordable. I also have problematic skin and no problems hear. I highly recommend it!

I had used the skin advisor multiple times and decided when my usual night cream was gone I would purchase this. When I got it I thought it smelled nice. When I first put it on it does feel velvety but only feels like it's workin on the surface of the skin. If I try to rub it in it starts to flake and ball off. After using this my fingers feel sticky like gum. Have not noticed any difference for dark spots.

I am 43 years old and never been a fan of moisturizers. I was using Netrogeon for a while and thought it was finally a moisturizers I actually like as I have combination skin. I tried luminous-tone-perfecting-cream-moisturizer and LOVE IT!!! It makes my skin feel like velvet. And the tone of my skin has improved. I can't stop touching my face. Please continue making this forever.

I've used Olay products for a whole now and I love how well they work. This particular one left my face feeling soft and hide my dark spots as well as my few wrinkles I have. I'm a big fan of this line of products they have available and can't wait to see what else they come up with next.

No pros, only cons. Left a matte finish. Had the same experience with peeling as other users. Left my skin feeling dry and lonely. Decided to keep it and use it as hand cream, but it even made my cuticles sad. I like the Regenerist microsculpting cream with SPF much better, and that's the one I would recommend.

I've been using this product for quite a while now and never had any issues, always loved it! It has faded my acne scars quite a bit. The only reason I'm giving it 3 stars is because I recently bought a new jar and I too have been having the flakiness issue as other people. I'm not sure if something changed, or if it has to do with other products I'm using (which never was an issue before) It's definitely odd, but I will continue to use it because it works so well for me!

I received this sample in my Winter Wal-Mart beauty box. This moisturizer has a whipped consistency, a little goes a long way, feels light on the skin, and left my face looking refreshed and feeling really well moisturized. Definitely will be purchasing this formula into my daily beauty routine. The only negativity I have towards this product is... that the sample wasn't big enough. LOL

I would recommend it to every women. My daughter has started to use it and loves the way her face feels. We are both have very pale skin. My mother had a very soft skin face up until the day she passed away. She was not a type of person to lay out on a sunny day. Since I live in Florida I have to be more careful and Olay is the best product I have found. I have tried many other Regenerist Products but Olay for my skin is the best

I love all Olay products I received this one in my sample box and I love it also.I am not a spring chicken anymore and when I received this I started using that evening after a couple days I could see the difference in my facial skin tones.I get really dry skin in the winter and seeing a difference that quickly was awesome.

I had some dark patches on my face and was hoping to find something to lighten them. A little bit of this Olay product each day and the dark patches faded away after just a couple of weeks. And it was so much more affordable than many other creams that couldn't have worked any better! The improvement to my skin tone was amazing.

I love this product. It feels so luxurious. I use it everyday and have already bought a replacement when my sample ran out. It is so clean feeling and the smell is light to non existent. The white color is pleasing as well. I use it all over my face neck and décolletage.

It's hard to rate something from a tiny sample but what I can say about Olay Luminous is that I liked the subtle scent, and that it made my face felt silky smooth after application. I wish the sample had been larger! All I could do was apply the moisturizer on my face once. Didn't have enough to apply it on my neck or decollete, which was disappointing. And I would love to know if it does, in fact, fade age spots...

I have always trusted Olay products, and their Olay Regenerist Luminous Tone Perfecting Moisturizer did not disappoint! It went on smoothly, felt great on my skin, and didn't leave a heavy, sticky feeling behind. I will certainly be purchasing this product, and have already recommended to my friends and family.
Thank you Olay!!

I'm an Olay fan, and this was a nice surprise. Based on the small size I received in my Wal Mart Beauty Box, I cannot rate effectiveness, but I can say that this product goes on smooth, smells nice, and is a fair price compared to other products of this nature in the marketplace.

I usually buy my eye moisturizer at Macy's for about $40 a jar . I don't need to anymore this stuff really works ! I ran out of my usual stuff so I used my sample until I could get more of my regular moisturizer but after using this product I'm sticking with it .

Olay has a way of making products that are as good as department store brands but can easily more of a chance for the average person to buy their products. I like the feel of it on my fingers as I apply it to my face. It has a whipped like feel to me. It is very light when applying. It also seemed to help make my skin feel a little bit better since it is very very dry right now in certain areas. It did however in the oily areas around the nose and forehead feel more oily and left a film .

I love this product. The texture was so nice, it applied well, didn't require a lot of product to get good coverage, my skin felt lovely after using it and the scent was good. I wish the sample had been larger to see the full results but I bought the product after trying it and therefore have been able to see the long-term results and the results are GREAT!. This is a product well worth using.

I only had a sample size was enough for couple uses but it was very moisturizing, I have very dry skin and I Usually have to apply moisturizers twice this worked on the 1st try, didnt use it long enough to see much of a difference tho need bigger samples

I use the whole Olay Regenerist line and have been for about a year now. Women are asking me all the time what products I use. It seems a little pricey at first (if you buy it all) but you really get a lot of product and it lasts a long time. I usually run out of one a month so it does not hurt the bank account too much. It is a great product and it works!

After using Oil of Olay regenerist luminous perfecting cream moisturizer my face felt refreshed. At my age this is the type of product that is perfect to get a head start on slowing down the aging process. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone that needs to add extra moisturizer for your face products or just to help with the aging process.

I received a sample of Olay Regenerist Luminous Tone Perfecting Cream Moisturizer from my Walmart box and I liked it. The smell is nice and my face felt hydrated. It is too early to tell if it helps to clear any blemishes but I do plan on purchasing a full size in the future to see if it will help to get rid of my blemishes.

Every time I have tried an Olay product I have enjoyed the smooth texture. This product has that Olay consistently smooth texture. It felt good on my face which tends to be very dry. As I sampled it I felt that my face was being nourished without an oily, greasy feel. Olay Luminous has a light fragrance. This was a first time use as a sample.

The Olay Regenerist Luminous Tone Perfecting cream is a nice face cream. It is light, smooth, and has a pleasant scent. I was able to use it under my makeup with no problems. It did make my skin feel nice and soft. I'd have to use it longer to see if it evens out tone, though. I would use it longer to see how it does, but it is a great moisturizer for everyday use too.

I really liked this. I already love the Olay brand and this product just ensures I've been right about them all this time. When I used this my skin felt like it had been exfoliated and scrubbed professionally. It went on my face so easily and I could immediately feel how soft my skin was. It had such a clean smell to the lotion and I really like that. This came in my Walmart Beauty Box and I'm glad it did. I wish there was more in the sample, but there was planety to try.

Olay makes very good products the moisture in my skin was very good and lasted it is easy to use and I think it would work on the tone and I have no idea if it will fade age spots or not there was not enough product in my sample to use long enough I do want to think it will tone and fade because Olay's other things work well smell nice and are easy to use

I really enjoyed this cream because it still moisturizing without being too thick. It was not oily, and didn't make me break out. Another thing I really liked about it was that it was only lightly scented. I think this cream is great for every day use and will help your skin look even and at it's best.

The Olay Regenerist Luminous Tone Perfecting Cream Moisturizer made my skin feel great without leaving my skin feeling greasy or oily. This product is lightweight, seemed to even my skin tone out, and smells great. I would Definitly use this product again and recommend this to family and friends.

I got a sample of this in my Walmart Beauty Box and am always glad to try out Olay products. I have to say that I can't evaluate it on it's claim of tone perfecting, since the description states that it will take up to 8 weeks to see results, and this is just a small sample. But I can say that it smells good and feels nice. Light and not greasy feeling on my face.

This was sticky but applied well. It did leave my face smooth and soft. I do not know if it evened out the tone. You would probably have to use it more than was in the sample container. I would have to use this more often to find out. I might purchase this product.

I absolutely love this product. It feels awesome on my skin. Goes on really smooth. Haven't had the product long enough to see skin tone changes yet. I'm looking forward to skin tone changes, though...not sure how long that takes but I'm willing to wait!

I've used Olay products since their original offering of facial moisturizer only. I can always count on the product be gentle for my sensitive skin. Additionally, they have a number of products that are equally effective to some excessively expensive competitive brands. This offering is one of their higher priced products and, personally, I did not see any improvements in my skin from using it so I will not be repurchasing.

I'm going to go pick up some of this ASAP! My skin felt so soft and smooth after using it. I usually don't use name brand products ( if I can get the same or similar results for less money, why not?) but this product has definitely shown me what I was missing out on.

This product has a very light scent, that doesn't aggravate my allergies or asthma. It feels nice, when you apply it. I haven't noticed any changes with my dark spots on my face. I keep using it and hoping. I've only been using a few weeks. Maybe with long term, every day use it might have the desired effect.

I love Olay products. Especially Olay Regenerist Luminous Tone Perfecting Cream Moisturizer. I could see results with in two weeks. The darker spots on my face started to get lighter! The product is easy to use and smells great! I bought the full size product after trying the sample. Thanks Walmart Beauty Box for this great sample.

This moisturizer should come with a warning label that states, Will cause major glowing to the face and you will be addicted to that glow because you can't go back to looking dull and bland after receiving so many compliments from everyone! Okay, I know a little dramatic but this product is amazing and I will never stop using it. Thank you Olay!

The sample was so small I have no idea if this is a good product. I love skincare and enjoy trying new products, but there was not enough of this to get a good idea. Based on the tiny amount in the sample, I didn't feel anything special in the creme that would prompt me to spend the money to try it.

Well, I'm reviewing a sample so I'm not sure I can really say that it actually worked. I'm in my 40's and have some light expression lines. My skin has always had a natural glow to it because I regularly drink a gallon of water a day. I didn't really see or feel any difference in the 2 days I used this. If anything, my skin was irritated and blotchy.

I have very oily skin, but I know it is still important to moisturize and I have had the most tough time finding a moisturizer that does it's job without adding to the oil or leaving my face feelings greasy. This one is it!!!! Absorbed well and made my face so soft and smooth feeling! LOVE it- just wish it were cheaper!!

I am rarely wowed by a sample, especially a tiny face cream sample, but I was with this. It made my complexion immediately appear smoother but without the shiny/greasy look of other moisturizers. I promptly purchased a full sized jar of the stuff. Actually, I purchased two jars and gave one to a friend who also loved it.

I received a sample of this in my Fall Wal-Mart Beauty Box. I love the scent and how easily it rubs into my skin. It's not too thick and the scent is perfect. I don't absolutley have a need for this type of cream right now but I will be purchasing it in the future!

Sadly, this cream is much too emollient for my oilier complexion. This stays tacky on my skin for hours then sticks to my pillowcase. I'm sure someone with dry skin would love it so I'm not taking off a star for that. Obviously since I won't be buying it and continuing its use, I wouldn't know how well it would work (or not). But Olay creates some very nice products and I'd be tempted to try the full size if it would work for me.

I'm 29 and the Olay Regenerist Luminous Tone Perfecting Cream Moisturizer worked beautifully on my minor fine lines and helped to even my overall skin tone. It's step 5 in my 6 step daily skincare routine. It smells nice and you don't need much for a smooth, hydrated feel.

The size of the sample was very nice. It's been months and I'm still using that sample size. It's small enough that I can keep it next to my laptop with my vitamins I take each morning. I pop the vitamins with a cup of hot tea and then moisturize with Pond's. I love it. It's not greasy and smells great too. You only need a very little to go a long way, which is why my sample container is only half used! I wouldn't purchase anything else!

This product claims it will even out your tone after a few uses and I wish I had enough to see that change. But given the amount I had I would say this is a great product and it left my face with a natural glow and softness that I have not seen in a long time. I used this product 2 nights in a row and while I didn't seen my tone change, I did see my skin improve.

Former sun bunny here (as in baby oil and iodine in my teens and 20's thru sun bathing in my 40's). Noticed dark spots and various sun damage fading rapidly. You won't have to wait (or buy a second jar) before seeing results. Bonus: good moisturizer, absorbs quickly, pleasant, mild fragrance.

I liked this a lot. It wasn't too heavy and didn't sting my eyes when I put it near them like some others do. It also doesn't turn my face red and splotchy like some others do. It moisturized and wasn't sticky feeling. It wasn't as expensive as some of the other brands.

I received this product in Walmart Beauty Box. It made my skin feel soft and smooth, the sample was not enough to rate the fading of dark spots. It is a good moisturizer. It is not a heavy moisturizer, followed with routine and skin was still soft at the end of the day. This light scent was good for me.

No! One cannot go wrong with any Olay product. My skin feels so good and looks amazing when I use Olay products. You are never too young to begin a good skin care regime. Using quality products will make your efforts pay off. If I had to choose just one skin care product it would definitely be moisturizer. Beginning in the teens young people should keep their skin hydrated to avoid unnecessary breakouts. Continuing this practice, your skin will thank you!

After trying the sample I received in my beauty box, I had to go buy the full size version. I love this. It smells great! Priced at only $25.00 it's well worth it. It makes my skin so soft. I haven't used it long enough to see if it really fades dark spots but I will check back in a month and let everyone know.

I'm a grocery beauty kind of shopper. I don't have much extra money and I wish this could be found cheaper than $20 (with the use of coupons!!) anywhere. This stuff is amazing but sadly I can��t afford it so I have to live with the samples that are few and far between.

I can't believe I'm reviewing a sample foil pack but hey here it goes. I loved how this made my skin feel, only reason I gave 3 stars is bc I literally had one time use out of how small this foil pack was for me. Can't tell if this did anything for me and since it's so small I will not buy til I get a better sample

Olay regenererist luminous tone perfecting cream, leaves my skin so smooth, not greasy, but light feeling & moisturized! I love this stuff! As I age, I find that my skin is losing it's natural, more even skin tone & although I only got a small amount of this, I'm tempted to buy the product, bc I feel my results could only get better! I'd recommend this product!

Hey evryone well first i gor this as a sample in my Walmart Beauty box. This was my first time trying this and unfortunate to say was not so pleased with it. Left my face feeling dry and flakey. It did smell great but besides that i was not thrilled with this product dont think ill use it again. Sorry.

Olay Luminous Tone Perfecting Cream, Face Moisturizer, was very relaxing. This was applied after a fresh clean and dried face wash. I applied cream before bed, it was very refreshing it was not sticky and absorbed well. I could feel and see a difference in my skin the next morning. My skin was bright, not bloche and red. Still felt clean and was not greasy. Skin felt soft also.

The sample size was only big enough for one application. I usually like to use something for at least a week minimum to be able to properly evaluate the product. It smells pleasant and applied nicely on my skin and absorbed quickly which was nice. But that's about all I can say about this product only getting to use it one time.

I've never used many products on my face, i have sensitive skin and will break out with red bumps from many produces. This product was very smooth and felt refreshing on my skin and left it glowing and moisturized. I had no problems with irritation. I like this product and will recommend it to my friends. I started using it on the drier areas between my eyes brows and the smile lines of my cheeks then incorporated using it in my daily morning routine.

I received a sample of this product in my first beauty box. It feels so smooth on my skin makes my skin feel like velvet. It even lightened my age spots. I will certainly recommend this to my friends. Since we are getting older we can use all the help we can get to feel younger.

This moisturizer does what it says! It made my skin evened out and left it super soft, without the heavy greasiness some can leave. A little goes a long ways too. I've spent a good amount of money on more expensive brands and didn't get as much results as I did with this.

I will be hesitant to buy this again as I will only use it at night time now because it does flake off if I put makeup on over it after it's dried it actually makes my makeup look very dry and Flaky very disappointed because for the money I was hoping I could wear it under my makeup I will only use it at night now. I even tried using Less on my skin and it still flaky

I was very excited to try this product to even up my skin tone since I am a fan of the Oil of Olay Regenerist moisturizer, however after application, I noticed it was flaking off unto my clothing and a white residue on my face. Due to opening the product, I did not want to throw away my money so I have opted to continue using the product at night, but I will not be purchasing again after this product is depleted. It appears this is a common problem with this product for many users.

I have always loved Oil Of Olay products and this is as well as all the other of their products that I have ever used. I have never been disappointed in any of their products, not ever. They have always seemed to be of high quality ingredients and have never had skin issues from them and seem to work as well if not better than some of their higher end priced competitors. Never ever a disappointment in any of them.

Olay beauty products are some of the best on the market. Yes, you can go to specialty stores and buy very expensive products that don't perform any better than dependable Olay. It has never let me down. There are many products available to choose from in the Olay line.

Began noticing dark uneven skin around right eye after I turned 37. Decided to try Olay, my grandmother used this brand my entire life, after 3 weeks i began to notice a lightening of the skin, continued to use it, nights only, and in 7 weeks skin tone is even and looks great. Absolutely works!!

same as the problem of other people every time i use it ..it has this flaky residue that peels off from my face.. i bought the miracle boost and the luminous tone moisturizer used it together and follow the direction carefully . the flaky residue still there but i like how it feels on the skin. so just use it at night i guess and not during day time unless they can suggest something to prevent this from happening

So as far as moisturizing goes its not the best. I use moisturizers at night before bed and when I use this product I usually wake up with dry skin. However my skin is always incredibly soft and it does even out my skin tone. If you paired this with a regular moisturizer you'd be set!!

I tried this product out first as a sample in a magazine and loved it! First of all this product does what it says its going to do by hydrating the skin and leaving it soft and smooth; secondly it smells great, and thirdly I have had a lot hits and misses with Olay's skin care products, so I was very pleased when this one came through. Also this product claims to fade the appearance of dark spots and evens the skin tone in about 8 weeks, well I'll have to see about that. I am reviewing this product as a part of a contest!

And I'm amazed that it delivered results in exactly a 2 week time frame. I wanted to test the strength of it so I applied it only to my under eye dark cirlcles and it worked! Lighter dark cirlcles and those tiny little crystals my concealer look more effective. I'm African american and it's hard to find products that work for me. This stuff is the real deal!

I tried the Luminous Tone product when I couldn't find my regular Micro-sculpting Olay product. I could only use the Luminous Tone product for three days. It has a sticky feel to it and did not have the pleasant smell that I'm used to with Olay products.

I use more of this product at night and less in the morning. A little goes a long way!! I think anyone who might review it as "gummy" might be using too much? I'm in my mid-40's and have combination skin with multiple dark spots. It soothed my dry skin immediately (thank you!) and my skin is finally evening out. I love it and it is worth every penny!

I was stressed when my skin started breaking out monthly the past 3 months leaving scars and my skin very uneven. I have been using product for almost 2 weeks now and am blow away. I'd say about 80% of my marks and spots have already faded. I can not wait to see my results after 8 weeks. UNREAL! Love it ! Would love to try more of the regenerist line in time .

I've had some dark age spots on my cheek that I tried everything on them. I am a light skinned red head in my 50's and I never should have used tanning beds when I was younger because my skin is paying for it now. The dark spots have faded a lot after using this for a month. I just use it at night. I wouldn't recommend it under make up.

Deep cleans my body and face,leaves my face feeling fresh and looking young again .making me feel like im young again. It massage my skin making it smooth and soft, this is the best product that i've tried so far and i recemended to everyone..enjoy this product evrytime i step out of the shower

Works perfectly on my bumpy face! I have a ton of acne scars and this thing smoothes up my face like never before, I wish for everyone who has acne scars to use this makeup product to help smooth out their beautiful faces. Also there variety of color help match my skin so it looks like nothing is there.
